name: pearl
short_effect: Sell for 700 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 1400 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A rather small pearl that has a very nice silvery sheen to it. It can be sold cheaply to shops.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A rather small pearl that has a very nice silvery sheen to it. It can be sold cheaply to shops.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A rather small pearl that has a very nice silvery sheen to it. It can be sold at a low price to shops.
